name: Shadow Ghost
text: You can move between the Shadow Plane and the Material Plane more often.
benefit: You gain the ability to use shadow walk an additional time each day.
special: You may select this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.
text_zh: 你可以更加频繁地来往于阴影位面与主物质位面之间。
prerequisites_zh: 窃影鬼，‘行影术’类法术能力。
benefit_zh: 你获得每天可以额外使用一次‘行影术’的能力。
special_zh: 你可以多次选择该专长，其效果叠加。
